name: ScanDroitin™ Chondroitin Sulfate, Ph.Eur
description: Scandroitin™ Chondroitin Sulfate, Ph.Eur is a natural and pure choice for the sourcing of top-quality ingredients in your finished formulations. Pharmaceutical grade chondroitin sulfate by ZPD is strictly manufactured under Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP) and without the use of organic solvents. ZPD support you with technical expertise and competences until your registration is fully completed.
